snippet: The Brazilian music legend Gilberto Gil performed his forró to open the Voices of Latin America series at Carnegie Hall.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performance by Brazilian songwriter Gilberto Gil at Carnegie Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Brazilian music legend Gilberto Gil performed his forró to open the Voices of Latin America series at Carnegie Hall.

headline.seo: Gilberto Gil at Carnegie Hall in Voices of Latin America
headline.main: Rustic Melodies Survive a Long Trip
